name: Home Sweet Tomb
description:
An unnamed figure roams about an empty house, searching for something unknown, lost in the memories of a time forgotten.

"Home Sweet Tomb" is a third-person exploration game where your character has to solve puzzles to overcome obstacles and unravel the link between him and this mysterious place.

Controls

Move with WASD, pick up and drop objects with SPACE

Credits

Game Design: Massimiliano Minio (MomoSakuraba), Francesco Romeo

Programming: Luca Rickler (MoonlitChamaleon), Maria Giulia Canu (GiMoody)

Concept artist: Giorgio Donato (Kawassass00)

Character artist: Clara Lollo  (Clara L. Vegel Grady)

3D / Texture Artists: Samuele Terazzi (scangames), Fabio Canella, Clara Lollo (Clara L. Vegel Grady),  Marco Donato (Capestranus), Giorgio Donato (Kawassass00)

Character rigging/animation: Marco Donato (Capestranus)

Special Thanks to:

-our Families and friends.

-this GameJam Session organizers(double thanks for the croissants!)

-The MeatBall Empress/Queen

In loving memory of "Little Jumping Catapult", which didn't make it to the end of the Jam. You  dwell in the Cut-Content Heaven ...We will miss you dearly.
